org.wso2.carbon.identity.openidconnect

Class DefaultIDTokenBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wso2.carbon.identity.openidconnect.DefaultIDTokenBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDTokenBuilder

    public class DefaultIDTokenBuilder
extends Object
implements IDTokenBuilder
    Default IDToken generator for the OpenID Connect Implementation. This IDToken Generator utilizes the Nimbus SDK to build the IDToken.
